channel.title: February on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in February on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Winter, slumbering in the open air, wears on its smiling face a dream... of spring. Ciao.
item.description: Okay, campers, rise and shine, and don't forget your booties 'cause it's cooooold out there today!  TV Tropes has a great breakdown of the classic elements of the movie Groundhog Day.

item.title: art on a shovel, some sources: metalworking
item.description: Getting ready for a February art on a shovel project ("shovel ready!"). Here's some sources of inspiration. Masks from recycled shovel blades, John T. Unger. Plasma cut steel shovels, Cal Lane. Shovel art, Texas Lone Star, Iron Signs and Designs. Each of these involve some serious metalworking, generally with round point dirt shovel as the starting point.
